client.apis.v1.credit_approval 源代码

# -*- coding: utf-8 -*-
"""
@File        : credit_approval.py
@Author      : wst
@Time        : 2022/3/3 下午3:59
@Description : X信审批--开立审批/接收审批/转让审批
"""
from rest_framework.exceptions import APIException
from rest_framework.generics import ListAPIView
from rest_framework.viewsets import ReadOnlyModelViewSet

from client.client_permissions import XLetterManageOpenApprovePermission, XLetterManageTransferPermission, \
    XLetterManageReceivedPermission
from client.filters.credit_approval import OpenApprovalFilter, CapitalOpenCreditCertificateFilter, \
    ReceiveApprovalFilter, TransferApprovalFilter
from client.models.credit_certificate import (
    CreditCurrentNode,
    ReviewLog
)
from client.models.company import Company
from client.serializers.credit_open import (
    CapitalOpenApprovalListSerializer,
    CapitalOpenApprovalDetailSerializer
)
from client.models.credit_certificate import CreditCertificate
from client.serializers.credit_approval import OpenApprovalSerializer, \
    ReceiveApprovalDoneSerializer, ReceiveApprovalUndoSerializer, TransferApprovalSerializer
from client.apis.v1.base_class import BaseApprovalView
from client.apis.v1.base_node import OPEN_EXAMINE, OPEN, OPEN_RECEIVE_CONFIRM, TRANSFER, RECEIVE_CONFIRM, \
    TRANSFER_EXAMINE
from consts.common import APPROVAL_REVIEW_CODE
from utils.drf.paginations import MyPageNumberPagination



[文档]class OpenApprovalView(ListAPIView):
    """核心企业开立审批列表"""
    filterset_class = OpenApprovalFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination
    serializer_class = OpenApprovalSerializer
    # x信-x信管理-开立审批-列表
    permission_classes = [XLetterManageOpenApprovePermission]


[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        status = self.request.query_params.get("status", "undo")
        business_name = OPEN
        company_id = self.request.company.id
        work_flow_node = OPEN_EXAMINE
        obj = BaseApprovalView(business_name=business_name,
                               company_id=company_id,
                               work_flow_node=work_flow_node)
        if status == "undo":
            # 待审批
            results = obj.get_queryset_undo().order_by('-id')
            return results
        elif status == "done":
            # 审批通过
            results = obj.get_queryset_done().order_by('-id')
            return results




[文档]class ReceiveApprovalView(ListAPIView):
    """一般企业接收审批列表"""
    filterset_class = ReceiveApprovalFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination
    # x信-x信管理-x信接收审批-列表
    permission_classes = [XLetterManageReceivedPermission]


[文档]    def get_serializer_class(self):
        """ 获取序列化器
        由于返回结果字段不一样，要分两种情况
        """
        status = self.request.query_params.get("status", "undo")
        if status == "undo":
            return ReceiveApprovalUndoSerializer
        return ReceiveApprovalDoneSerializer



[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        open_company_name = self.request.query_params.get("open_company_name", "")
        transfer_company_name = self.request.query_params.get("transfer_company_name", "")
        obj_open = BaseApprovalView(
                business_name=OPEN,
                company_id=self.request.company.id,
                work_flow_node=OPEN_RECEIVE_CONFIRM
            )
        obj_transfer = BaseApprovalView(
                business_name=TRANSFER,
                company_id=self.request.company.id,
                work_flow_node=RECEIVE_CONFIRM
            )
        status = self.request.query_params.get("status", "undo")
        if status == "undo":  # 待审批
            # 开立接收待审批
            objs_open = obj_open.get_queryset_undo()
            if open_company_name != "":
                # 对于开立业务，如果“原始开立企业”条件传了，则过滤
                objs_open = objs_open.filter(from_company__name__contains=open_company_name)
            # 转让接收待审批
            objs_transfer = obj_transfer.get_queryset_undo()
            if open_company_name != "":
                # 对于转让业务，如果“原始开立企业”条件传了，则过滤
                objs_transfer = objs_transfer.filter(credit__receive_company__name__contains=open_company_name)
            if transfer_company_name != "":
                # 对于转让业务，如果“转让企业”条件传了，则过滤
                objs_transfer = objs_transfer.filter(from_company__name__contains=transfer_company_name)
            results = objs_open | objs_transfer
            return results.order_by('-id')
        elif status == "done":
            # 开立接收已审批
            objs_open = obj_open.get_queryset_done()
            if open_company_name != "":
                # 对于开立业务，如果“原始开立企业”条件传了，则过滤
                objs_open = objs_open.filter(from_company__name__contains=open_company_name)
            # 转让接收已审批
            objs_transfer = obj_transfer.get_queryset_done()
            if open_company_name != "":
                # 对于转让业务，如果“原始开立企业”条件传了，则过滤
                objs_transfer = objs_transfer.filter(credit__receive_company__name__contains=open_company_name)
            if transfer_company_name != "":
                # 对于转让业务，如果“转让企业”条件传了，则过滤
                objs_transfer = objs_transfer.filter(from_company__name__contains=transfer_company_name)
            results = objs_open | objs_transfer
            return results.order_by('-id')




[文档]class TransferApprovalView(ListAPIView):
    """一般企业转让审批列表"""
    filterset_class = TransferApprovalFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination
    serializer_class = TransferApprovalSerializer
    # x信-x信管理-x信转让审批-列表
    permission_classes = [XLetterManageTransferPermission]


[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        status = self.request.query_params.get("status", "undo")
        business_name = TRANSFER
        company_id = self.request.company.id
        work_flow_node = TRANSFER_EXAMINE
        obj = BaseApprovalView(business_name=business_name,
                               company_id=company_id,
                               work_flow_node=work_flow_node)
        if status == "undo":
            # 待审批
            results = obj.get_queryset_undo().order_by('-id')
            return results
        elif status == "done":
            # 审批通过
            results = obj.get_queryset_done().order_by('-id')
            return results




[文档]class CapitalOpenApproval(BaseApprovalView):
    """资金方开立审批列表类"""
    def __init__(self, company_id):
        """初始化函数"""
        super().__init__('open', company_id, 'approval_review')
    

[文档]    def get_queryset_done(self):
        """获取审批通过数据集"""
        cc_ids = self.get_cc_done()
        return CreditCertificate.objects.filter(
            id__in=cc_ids
        ).select_related(
            'from_company',
            'company'
        ).order_by(
            '-id'
        ).only(
            'number',
            'amount',
            'created_at',
            'promise_pay_at',
            's1_user_id',
            'from_company__name',
            'company__name',
        )

    

[文档]    def get_queryset_undo(self):
        """获取待审批数据集"""
        cc_ids = self.get_credit_certificateds_undo()
        return CreditCertificate.objects.filter(id__in=cc_ids).order_by('-id')

    


[文档]class CapitalOpenApprovalReadViewSet(ReadOnlyModelViewSet):
    """资金机构查询开立审批"""
    filterset_class = CapitalOpenCreditCertificateFilter
    pagination_class = MyPageNumberPagination
    # x信-x信管理-开立审批-
    permission_classes = [XLetterManageOpenApprovePermission]


[文档]    def get_serializer_class(self):
        """获取序列化器"""
        if self.action == 'list':
            return CapitalOpenApprovalListSerializer
        return CapitalOpenApprovalDetailSerializer



[文档]    def get_queryset(self):
        """原始数据集"""
        params = self.request.query_params.dict()
        # 判断状态参数: 待审批=undo、已审批=done
        status = params.get('status', 'undo')
        if status not in ('undo', 'done'):
            raise APIException("invalid status!")
        
        # 判断公司类型: 资金机构company_type__name=financial_institutions
        company: Company = self.request.company
        if company.company_type.name != 'financial_institutions':
            raise APIException('invalid company!')

        # 实例化资金方开立审批列表类
        capital_open_approval = CapitalOpenApproval(company.pk)
        if status == 'undo':
            return capital_open_approval.get_queryset_undo()
        
        return capital_open_approval.get_queryset_done()



[文档]    def get_object(self):
        """获取某个数据"""
        # 判断公司类型: 资金机构company_type__name=financial_institutions
        company: Company = self.request.company
        if company.company_type.name != 'financial_institutions':
            raise APIException('invalid company!')

        cc_id = self.kwargs.get('pk')
        
        # 是否被当前节点审批过
        is_reviewed = ReviewLog.objects.filter(
            data_id=cc_id,
            data_table=CreditCertificate._meta.db_table,
            work_flow__code=APPROVAL_REVIEW_CODE,
            result__in=('pass', 'reject')
        ).exists()
        # 是否该被当前节点审批
        is_now = CreditCurrentNode.objects.filter(
            credit_certificate_id=cc_id,
            work_flow__code=APPROVAL_REVIEW_CODE
        ).exists()

        if not (is_reviewed or is_now):
            raise APIException('not found')

        try:
            cc = CreditCertificate.objects.filter(pk=cc_id).select_related(
                'credit', 'company', 'from_company', 'credit_certificate_receive_time_limit'
            ).only(
                'created_at',
                'number',
                'promise_pay_at',
                'amount',
                'company__credit_code',
                'company__name',
                'from_company__credit_code',
                'from_company__name',
                'credit__capital_company__credit_code',
                'credit__capital_company__name',
                'credit__financing_annualized_interest_rate',
                'credit_certificate_receive_time_limit__name',
                'business_id',
                'credit__credit_number',
                'credit__start',
                'credit__end'
            ).first()
        except CreditCertificate.DoesNotExist:
            raise APIException('not found')
        
        if cc.credit.capital_company_id != company.pk:
            raise APIException('invalid company!')
        
        return cc
